Package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions

package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    AckManager
    Allow to use a single exception class to handle and generate all possible Model/server errors
    AlreadyUsed
    Indicate user already use this card/leader
    EmptyDeposit
    indicate this deposit is empty
    FullDepositException
    Indicate the deposit in which user try to insert was full
    IllegalResourceMove
    Incopatible resource swap
    IllegalSwap
    Inompatible resource swap, if user try to do a swap wich broke game rules
    IncompatibleTypesComparison
    Incompatible resources comparison (sum,sub) operation
    LeaderActivated
    this leader is already activated
    MatchFull
    Match is full
    NicknameAlreadyTaken
    Its impossible with all the check we do but this exception occur if thers 2 player with same name
    NoBonusDepositOwned
    If user try to access a deposit bonus that he dosnt own
    NotEnoughPlayers
    Not enought player to start match
    NotEnoughResource
    occur when player dont have resources to pay
    NotSoddisfedPrerequisite
    Cant activate leader due prerequisite
    WrongPosition
    Not existing position, out of range (eg deposit number 10)
